body:
What steps will reproduce the problem? 1. Play Reality Acid, having the computer's Sword of Body and Mind (currently equipped on a Spiketail Hatchling) as a target. What is the expected output? What do you see instead? Expected: Reality Acid is in play, attached to Sword.
Actual: Reality Acid disappears. It doesn't show up in play, nor in any graveyard, nor in exile. What version of the product are you using? On what operating system? Magarena 1.24 on WinXP
author: [i...@tandetnik.org](https://code.google.com/u/100964988663965718405/)
title: Reality Acid, when played on Sword of Body and Mind, completely disappears

comments.body:
I can confirm this happens but haven't found out what causes it yet. Seems related to attaching Reality Acid to an equipment as the bug will show not just for Sword of Body and Mind but any equipment.

**Status:** Accepted
comments.author: [BeHold...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/116281131070537299190/)

comments.body:
This is fixed by revision 94071b66ac3b and revision 1ce3ceda2749 . The fix will be part of release 1.27.

**Status:** Fixed
